items.sentence: I hope that things stay this way for a while.
Are you going to cut down all the trees here?
We went to Australia last month to visit Tom.
Tom works for a trading company in Australia.
Tom will stay in Australia for several weeks.
Tom went to Australia on business last month.
All the flights to Boston have been canceled.
I don't know how to prove I wasn't in Boston.
I needed to do that, but Tom wouldn't let me.
There are a lot of red flowers in the garden.
